snippet.title: Colony Siege - RTS / Tower Defense Hybrid - Trailer
snippet.description:
Build your base. Construct towers, traps, mechs, and other defenses. Command your units in battle. Can you survive the enemy onslaught? 

Now available on Steam!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1198740/Colony_Siege/ Build your base. Construct towers, traps, mechs, and other defenses. Command your units in battle. Can you survive the enemy onslaught? 

Now available on Steam! 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1198740/Colony_Siege/ Build your base. Construct towers, traps, mechs, and other defenses. Command your units in battle. Can you survive the enemy onslaught? 

Now available on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1198740/Colony_Siege/ Protect humanity's last colonies from extermination in this tower defense and real time strategy hybrid. Fight the Xenos and Riven alone or with a friend, using a wide arsenal of towers, traps, mobile units, and strikes.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1198740/Colony_Siege/
